ygData.subject: Re: 16th Rank Water Breathing Song
ygData.msgSnippet: ... directions ... To follow up on my own message: I was there last night, looking for the 23rd level song, and found that (at least on Solusek Ro) he has
ygData.messageBody:
>The guy selling the bard songs in High Hold is standing in front of a
>picture a few rooms away from the bank. I can't give any better
directions
>than that, but that should be enough for you to find him if you search a
>bit.

To follow up on my own message: I was there last night, looking for the
23rd level song, and found that (at least on Solusek Ro) he has moved.
He's not in front of the picture any more -- he's in the back room of the
small library behind the picture.

- Windsong Wanderer, bard on Solusek Ro
